Package com.artemis.annotations

Annotations used by Artemis.

See: Description

  • Annotation Types Summary 
    Annotation Type Description
    Mapper Deprecated
    See Wire.
    PackedWeaver
    Transforms a Component into a PooledComponent.
    PooledWeaver
    Transforms a Component into a PackedComponent.
    Wire
    Reflexively injects ComponentMapper, EntitySystem and Manager fields upon calling World.setSystem(com.artemis.EntitySystem) or World.setManager(com.artemis.Manager).

Package com.artemis.annotations Description

Annotations used by Artemis.

Most prominently the Mapper annotation for injecting ComponentMappers into systems and managers.

The weaver annotations can transform normal Component classes into a more appropriate type without writing the required boilerplate. The artemis-odb-maven-plugin is required for performing such transformations.
